review: I love my Apple TV. So far I've had it for only 3 days but I think it's great. 4 Stars only because I have a smart TV and didn't realize that the Apple TV does a lot of the same things my smart TV does. But, I was looking for a way to connect my movies from iTunes and listen to Pandora etc. on the TV with ease and Apple TV does just that for me!I'm ready to get rid of my cable TV altogether!1. Easy to set up2. Connected in seconds to my iPad, iPhone, and Macbook Pro3. Great picture, easy to use remote!
author: Pam Bowers

review: I purchased the Apple TV for my mom and she loves it and I really enjoy using it whenever I am home visiting. The controller and device are sturdy and feel like quality products like most of Apple's branded products.Pros: Usability and functionality are nice. It interfaces seamlessly with Apple products.Cons: Apple proprietary, so no go on other wireless devices, which for any Apple user should know this anyways. Limited amount of channel options such as Netflix, Hulu, etc. This is why I gave it 4 stars. The price is a little steep to have such a limited selection compared to Roku, but the quality of the product is better. Don't forget you have to buy a HDMI cable for this product!
